newsitem.title: USA: Microsoft says Normandy beta II available.
newsitem.headline: Microsoft says Normandy beta II available.

text.p: Microsoft Corp said Monday the beta II version of its software for Internet server software, called Normandy, has been shipped to preview customers on CD and is available for downloading from the World Wide Web.
Normandy is designed to help users cultivate information on the Web, address difficulties in content publishing and site management, and conduct business online.
"Strong customer demand is driving us to expand the beta program, Anthony Bay, general manager of the Internet services, said in a statement.
Microsoft Internet News Server is the first Normandy-based software available for Web download.
Microsoft Internet Chat Server and Microsoft Content Replication Server, two other applications in the Normandy family, are scheduled to be available within two weeks.
